alert.note: Alert for Coastal St. Johns; Eastern Putnam; Inland Flagler; Inland St. Johns (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 06 at 8:37PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Flagler, southeastern St. Johns and northeastern Putnam Counties through 915 PM EDT... At 837 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Hastings, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hastings, Orange Mills, Federal Point, Spuds and Elkton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal St. Johns; Eastern Putnam; Inland Flagler; Inland St. Johns
